definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Expressing opinions is one example of culture difference between east and west.
sentences.chinese: 表達觀點的不同是中西文化差異的一個典型例子。

sentences.english: This paper discusses on Miss Lin's novel technique-----a blend of Chinese .
sentences.chinese: 文章着重就林徽因小說中西文化交融技巧作一探析。

sentences.english: The translation activities had great influences on the cultural intercommunion.
sentences.chinese: 這種翻譯活動對於中西文化交流的影響是雙向的。

sentences.english: Thirdly, Shan Shili's contributions to culture communication between China and Western Europe in modern times.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，單士釐對近代中西文化交流的貢獻。

sentences.english: The Consultant will introduce how the teaching system will work for you.
sentences.chinese: 我們的顧問會詳細向您介紹環亞西文學習的教學模式。

sentences.english: The professor contrasted the Chinese culture with western culture in his newly published book.
sentences.chinese: 這位教授在他新進出版的書中將中西文化作了對比。

sentences.english: A bibliography of the Tibetan highland and its adjacent districts.
sentences.chinese: 青康藏高原暨毗鄰地區西文文獻目錄。

sentences.english: East-West Cultural Differences as Reflected in Bernhard Karlgren's Translation of the Book of Documents.
sentences.chinese: 高本漢《尚書》翻譯所反映的中西文化差異。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is more cultural exchange between the third with a one-way transmission of color.
sentences.chinese: 所以，這第三次中西文化交流更帶有單向傳導的色彩。

sentences.english: The copy cataloging is the main method for our country's western language cataloging.
sentences.chinese: 套錄編目是我國西文編目的主要方式。

sentences.english: It was this cultural idea that laid the foundation of Tao Xingzhi's thought on the social reform.
sentences.chinese: 這種中西文化觀念奠定了陶行知社會改造思想的基礎。

sentences.english: It is that Chinese and Western culture exchange burns, crystal being philosophic theory at all time.
sentences.chinese: 它是中西文化的交流點，是古今哲理的結晶。

sentences.english: This 20-part TV series focuses on the conflict between Chinese and Western culture.
sentences.chinese: 這部20集電視連續劇集中表現中西文化的衝突。

sentences.english: His translations of Sino-Western cultural classics have made a great contribution to Sino-Western cultural exchanges.
sentences.chinese: 他的中西文化經典翻譯爲中西文化交流作出了貢獻。

sentences.english: His translations of Sino-Western cultural classics have made a great contribution to Sino-Western cultural exchanges.
sentences.chinese: 他的中西文化經典翻譯爲中西文化交流作出了貢獻。

sentences.english: I guess I'm having culture shock.
sentences.chinese: 我想，這主要是中西文化的碰撞。

definition: sinology/Chinese studies (in foreign schools)/Han Learning, a Qing dynasty movement aiming at a philological appraisal of the Classics
old language/the Classics/Classical Chinese as a literary model, esp. in Tang and Song prose/Classical Chinese as a school subject
Western learning (intellectual movement in the late Qing)/also called 洋務運動|洋务运动
Chinese written language/Chinese literature esp. as taught abroad
